svcsubproc.title: Wheelchair Lift (Optional)
svcsubproc.para: The wheelchair lift is an available option and can be located in various positions in the bus body. The wheelchair lift is supplied with a 180 degree swing open door, which allows for full door opening access. The operation and maintenance of the chair lift assembly is supplied with the manufacturer's manuals. The wheelchair lift assembly controls are integrated with the bus electrical system.
The chair lift door is equipped with an interlock with door ajar alarm system, notifying the driver of the door status.

step1.para: For removal or service of the chair lift system, and or any adjustment, see the manufacturer's operator manual and maintenance guide for the proper operation and service for the chair lift assembly.
